Name: Cascade Cafe
About the game: Join a group of friends as they play a path building strategy boardgame, inspired by games of the Suujin Taisen genre. Place your tiles to line them up and connect their bridges, then combine their values to build unique sequences. Play through the main story as Nymo, a new arrival to a local cafe. Meet the regulars as they teach you how to play Cascade, where each day uncovers new strategies to explore. Learn each characters abilities and control the board state. Collect items which push tiles around the board, change their values or even place hidden traps. Collect abilities as you play through the story mode. Choose 3 abilities from your collection to take into the match. Play Online 1v1 against friends. Play Offline against a bots to practice with 7 levels of difficulty. Puzzle mode! Lofi chillhop soundtrack by Purrple Cat.
